newsitem.title: USA: LIVE says will merge with investor group.
newsitem.headline: LIVE says will merge with investor group.

text.p: LIVE Entertainment Inc said Friday it has entered into a merger agreement with an investor group led by Richland, Gordon & Co.
The company said its board of directors as well as Pioneer Electronic Corp, the holder of approximately 50.3 percent of the company's outstanding voting power, have agreed to the deal.
The company said holders of its series B preferred stock will receive $10 per share in cash, plus accrued dividends, and holders of its common stock will receive $6 per share in cash.
The company said its outstanding debt will also be redeemed at par plus accrued interest.
The company said the deal requires financing under commitment letters aggregating $150 million delivered by the investor group.
The company said the deal is also subject to approvals at a special shareholders meeting expected to be held in June.
